About myself

As my daughter says, I'm just a tired dad, with a tired name, Sam Warnick. I'm a software developer in Beaufort, SC.

Some things I do

  • I have an iOS app I work on occasionally. It's called Focuses and is meant to help you...focus.
  • I eat a lot of Oreos. Like, a lot.
  • I Collect LEGO sets.
  • I do a podcast with my oldest daughter.

Want to see my résumé for some reason? It's right here.
